short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to inject galaxy signature quotes in your Email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extensions or add-ons available that cater to Gmail users looking for signature customization, including the option to add quotes to their email signatures.
